meanings.definition: Cook (meat or vegetables) by browning in fat, then simmering in a covered dish with a small amount of liquid.
meanings.sent1: She braises the chicken in a pan before adding broth and letting it cook slowly.
meanings.sent2: The chef braises the beef until it is tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with the delicious aroma as she braised the pork for dinner.
meanings.sent4: As the flavors braised together, the dish transformed into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The method of braising helps the meat become juicy and tender.

meanings.sent1: The braises on the menu are always a hit with the customers.
meanings.sent2: She ordered the braises, eager to taste the savory dish.
meanings.sent3: The braises were so good that she couldn't resist having seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the braises wafted through the restaurant, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was the braises, cooked to perfection every time.
